title: Hiking
subTitle: Ghumpti Dada
description: Hiking in Nepal is one of the fantastic and joyful holidays in Nepal. Nepal Hiking holidays present beautiful Himalayan panorama and pass through different valleys of Nepalese settlements. Nepal day hiking tour offer cultural heritage sites, rural people and their culture. Hike in Nepal fit for those who has limit holidays to Nepal and fit for all age groups.Nepal hiking tour offer scenic mountains views , beautiful landscape, villaages and local culture of Nepal. Travelers will discover the single Day Hiking tour  in Nepal with various activities near by Kathmandu valley. Nepal hiking tour difficulty level is moderate  but trekkers should know details of Nepal hiking  information before heading to the relevant areas. Nepal day hiking tour doable inside Kathmandu valley and out side Kathmandu valley as per travelers wish and desire. Hiking tour in Nepal may extend till one week like short treks in Nepal Himalaya.

title: Rafting
subTitle: Marshyandi River
description: Rafting in Nepal is also popular as white water rafting; along with the whitewater, mountain originated river. It is the best way to explore Nepal, first book rafting and extend the other famous trip like Trekking and hiking, Safari, Climbing & Expedition, Tours and many more in Nepal.

title: Waterfall
subTitle: Sundarijal Waterfall
description: The name Sundarijal was derived from the term that "Sundari" means beautiful and "Jal" means water. The river Bagmati originates from this region and it has been the major source of water supply for Kathmandu valley since the Rana Dynasty. There is also a Hindu goddess, Sundarimai a temple dedicated to this name.[1]Sundarijal Hydropower Station, located at Sundarijal, 15 km northeast of Kathmandu with previous installed capacity of 640KW , now upgraded to 970 KW + 10% with fully customized automation from July 2021 under rehab works by contractor Power Mech Project Ltd

title: Sunrise View
subTitle: Nagarkot
description: The Nagarkot is the nearest and easily accessible Sunrise view from Kathmandu. The Nagarkot view point is located about 32KM from Kathmandu and it takes about an hour to reach there. You have to wake up and drive very early in the morning to take this Nagarkot Sunrise tour as you need to be there before the sun rise.

title: Valley View
subTitle: Chandragiri Hill
description: This hill offers beautiful views of the Kathmandu Valley and has a cable car that takes you to the top, where you can find a viewpoint tower and a historical park.
